lead_paragraph: The former All-Star, who had thought his career was over because of a rotator-cuff injury, learned after a recent M.R.I. test that he had a chance at pitching.

headline.print_headline: Nationals’ Arroyo May Pitch Again After Rehab of Shoulder
headline.main: Nationals’ Arroyo May Pitch Again After Rehab of Shoulder

snippet: The former All-Star, who had thought his career was over because of a rotator-cuff injury, learned after a recent M.R.I. test that he had a chance at pitching.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Washington Nationals announce pitcher Bronson Arroyo will be unable to play for one or two weeks, after which he will undergo rehabilitation for tear in his right rotator cuff; other baseball news noted.
